overview.problem_statement: Users currently face difficulties with the manual login process, leading to poor user experience and high abandonment rates during onboarding.
overview.solution_summary: Implement a modern, secure authentication system with biometric login, social login options, and streamlined user registration flow.
overview.target_audience: Mobile app users aged 18-65 who value convenience and security
overview.market_context: Competitors offer biometric authentication; we need this feature to remain competitive

business_goals: Reduce user onboarding abandonment rate by 30%
Increase user engagement by improving login experience
Enhance security posture of the application

success_metrics.measurement_method: Analytics tracking of successful vs failed login attempts
Funnel analysis from registration start to completion

key_results: Reduce average login time to under 10 seconds
Implement biometric authentication for 70% of supported devices

user_personas.name: Tech-Savvy Sarah
user_personas.description: 25-year-old professional who values efficiency and modern technology
goals: Quick and secure access to the app

user_stories.story: As a mobile app user, I want to log in using my fingerprint so that I can access the app quickly and securely
acceptance_criteria: User can enable biometric authentication in settings
Fingerprint login works on supported devices
Fallback to password is available if biometric fails

user_stories.story: As a new user, I want to register using my Google account so that I don't have to create another password
acceptance_criteria: User profile is created automatically from Google account
Terms and conditions acceptance is required

functional.description: System shall support biometric authentication (fingerprint, face recognition) on compatible devices
System shall provide social login options (Google, Apple, Facebook)
System shall implement password reset functionality via email

non_functional.description: All authentication data must be encrypted in transit and at rest
non_functional.acceptance_criteria: Use TLS 1.3 for data in transit and AES-256 for data at rest

non_functional.description: Login process should complete within 5 seconds under normal conditions
Authentication UI should be accessible to users with disabilities
non_functional.acceptance_criteria: Comply with WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards

technical_specifications.architecture_overview: Client-server architecture with OAuth 2.0 and JWT token-based authentication

api_specifications.request_format: JSON with email/password or OAuth token
api_specifications.response_format: JSON with JWT token and user profile

api_specifications.request_format: JSON with biometric hash and user ID

security_considerations: Implement rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks
Use secure storage for biometric templates
Regular security audits and penetration testing

milestones.name: Design and Architecture Complete
milestones.description: Finalized UI/UX designs and technical architecture

milestones.name: Backend API Development
milestones.description: Core authentication APIs implemented and tested

risks.description: Biometric API changes in mobile OS updates
risks.mitigation_strategy: Monitor OS beta releases and maintain fallback authentication methods
Conduct regular security reviews and penetration testing

assumptions: Users have devices that support biometric authentication
Third-party OAuth providers maintain API stability
Network connectivity is available for authentication

appendices.research_data: User research conducted in Q4 2023 shows 85% of users prefer biometric authentication

mockups_wireframes.name: Login Screen Mockup
mockups_wireframes.description: Visual design for the new login interface
